title: Tanky supports
body: I'm trying to learn every role in League, so I need a champion for every position, what do you think is the best tanky support?

replies.body:
I'd personally concur with the consistent Leona pick - at the least, there's few team comps that she doesn't fit well in, and has super solid tank stats. Thresh and Braum are both pretty good, but Thresh won't fit the tank role as well, and Braum is a little harder to work into some comps / against some comps. 

That, and I just like Leona. <3 Solari + <3 Mount Targon.

Hey there JonahGreen,

I main support so if you have any further inquiries other than what's asked in above feel free toad me in client. But to answer your question:

* Thresh
* Braum
* Alistar 
* Leona
* Malphite

Regards,
